docs.text: Welcome and about me I'm Jarek Gaze, and I'm working in IT since 2002 and below blog is for ordering my technolgies knowladge to help in every day work or share with colegues how we can some things do. https://www.linkedin.com/in/jaroslaw-gaze/ Competition matrix Below I tried present my technologies which I know Technologies Level Description Linux Windows Developing Python Spark Core Spark SQL Spark Streaming Bash Awk Perl SQL PL/SQL HQL HTML+CSS Databases Hive Oracle Mysql PostgreSQL Hadoop HDP CDP HDFS MapReduce Yarn Hive Kafka Cloud GCP Empty star - https://www.codesprogram.com/icons/Star-o-icon-in-font-awesome Half star - https://www.codesprogram.com/icons/Star-half-o-icon-in-font-awesome Full star - https://www.codesprogram.com/icons/Star-icon-in-font-awesome
